title: Nina Dobrev channels Billie Eilish for her costume at Casamigos' Halloween soiree
text:
Billie Eilish's creepy When The Party's Over music video features the disturbing image of the teen songstress crying jet black tears.

And Nina Dobrev gave a nod to the memorable video in her costume for the Casamigos' Halloween soiree in Beverly Hills on Friday night.

The 30-year-old Flatliners star had black lines running down her face , as well as the singer's telltale green hair as she entered the A-list event.

No tears left to cry: Nina Dobrev gave a nod to Billie Eilish's memorable When The Party's Over video in her costume for the Casamigos' Halloween soiree in Beverly Hills on Friday night

The actress also wore bright, baggy clothing reminiscent of the Bury A Friend songstress' frequent onstage look.

She completed the look with black, chunky boots.

Nina was just one of the stars on display at the event, alongside the likes of Justin Timberlake, Jessica Biel, Cindy Crawford, Lisa Rinna and Laverne Cox.

Bury a friend: The 30-year-old Flatliners star had black lines running down her face , as well as the singer's telltale green hair as she entered the A-list event. Eilish in the original video on the right

The style: The actress also wore bright, baggy clothing reminiscent of the Bury A Friend songstress' frequent onstage look

The annual Casamigos Halloween Party was thrown by the tequila brand's three co-founders: George Clooney, Cindy Crawford's husband Rande Gerber and real estate tycoon Mike Meldman.

Last year, Crawford got her Mod on with a retro air hostess look, for the tequila brand's Las Vegas party.

For the LA leg of the 2018 Halloween spectaular, the supermodel rocked an 80s punk aesthetic.
description: Nina Dobrev gave a nod to Billie Eilish's memorable When The Party's Over video in her costume for the Casamigos' Halloween soiree in Beverly Hills on Friday night.
